page.title: 04Farming - Culvers Farm
page.content: On Saturday, I (Jane) wake up at 7 o'clock,get washed,dressed and then have breakfast of cereal and orange juice.I then go down to the farm and ride my pony.I ride round a great big silage field and gallop up the side. Then I go into the goose field and jump a course consisting of ten jumps. I do this four times.Then I walk and trot round the ring .Then I clean my tack and have lunch.In the afternoon I ride my other pony. On the farm there are 13 sheep,8 cows,13 ducks,5 horses,20-30 hens,4 cockerels,30 pigs,geese and goselings. Brian has just made 77 big round silage bales.There are 5 barns.The farmer is going to make some hay and straw later on in the summer.
